7be180be-556a-4090-bafe-9294b7118f6d.description: Earners of the EFQM Foundation Training Certified have a fundamental knowledge of the EFQM Model and the RADAR logic. They can explain how the Model is structured. They can apply RADAR, the diagnostic and assessment tool, to identify strengths and areas for improvement. They understand how it can benefit their organisation, and how it could be used to overcome current and future challenges. These candidates are able to conduct a high-level health check of their organisation.
7be180be-556a-4090-bafe-9294b7118f6d.name: EFQM Foundation Training Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the EFQM Foundation Training

93dcbbe5-3b72-4977-9206-38a74df214a8.description: Earners of the EFQM Assessor Certified are equipped to conduct a strategic assessment of an organisation as part of a high-performing EFQM Assessment Team. To support an EFQM Assessment, candidates are able to analyse the ecosystem of an organisation to provide the context, to identify the strategic priorities, to ask strategically important questions, to develop appropriate hypotheses, to apply the EFQM diagnostic tools, to prepare value-adding feedback and to identify relevant good practices.
93dcbbe5-3b72-4977-9206-38a74df214a8.name: EFQM Assessor Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the EFQM Assessor Training
Successfully pass the EFQM Assessor Training

bf040008-edec-49ca-83ca-c1c6c4bda425.description: Earners of this badge have renewed their EFQM Assessor certification. They are equipped to conduct a strategic assessment of an organisation as part of a high-performing EFQM Assessment Team. They are able to analyse the ecosystem of an organisation to provide the context, to identify the strategic priorities, to ask strategically important questions, to develop appropriate hypotheses, to apply the EFQM diagnostic tools, to prepare value-adding feedback and to identify relevant good practices.
bf040008-edec-49ca-83ca-c1c6c4bda425.name: EFQM Assessor CPD Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the EFQM Assessor Training
Successfully pass the EFQM Assessor Training

EFQM’s scheme for continuing professional development provides a general framework and guidance but allows you the flexibility to create your own personal development path. You need to demonstrate at least 30 hours of CPD over a 3-year period to have your EFQM assessor qualification renewed. CPD activities must include a mixture of different types of learning, so you will need to carry out at least three different types of activity.

1b72480b-a175-402a-ac73-6364d599ce8d.description: Earners of this Certified Trainer badge are EFQM trainers who have been certified to deliver the official EFQM Foundation Training on behalf of an EFQM Certified Training Organisation. They have a thorough understanding of the EFQM Model and are experienced management or organisational improvement trainers. These candidates demonstrate proven experience in the field of training delivery.
1b72480b-a175-402a-ac73-6364d599ce8d.name: EFQM Certified Trainer - EFQM Foundation Training

badge_template_activities.title: Certified EFQM Trainer for the EFQM Foundation Training
EFQM Foundation Training and Accreditation
EFQM Foundation Training Certified

b0132e58-a7c9-4a70-b2df-ad623c9f40f2.description: Earners of this badge are equipped to lead change with confidence by using the EFQM Model to support the desired change. They can identify their personal strengths and what they bring to the change project, their personal bias as a Change Leader and minimise its impact. They can explain relevant aspects of the psychology of change, the importance of a growth mindset, and use strategies for creating and maintaining the momentum for change.
b0132e58-a7c9-4a70-b2df-ad623c9f40f2.name: EFQM Organisational Change Leader Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the EFQM Organisational Change Leader Training
Score a passing grade on the three marked assessment and  EFQM Organisational Change Leader test

e15876da-aa0f-4903-a39c-3b3b824b68b5.description: Earners of this Certified Trainer badge are EFQM trainers who have been certified to deliver the official EFQM Assessor Training on behalf of an EFQM Certified Training Organisation. These candidates demonstrate proven experience in the field of training delivery.
e15876da-aa0f-4903-a39c-3b3b824b68b5.name: EFQM Certified Trainer - EFQM Assessor Training

EFQM Assessor Certified

23836e11-4b24-413e-9b48-75293e686da8.description: Earners of the EFQM Global Award 2021 Assessor are selected from the EFQM Assessor community of hundreds of EFQM trained professionals from a wide variety of organisations around the globe. They contribute their expertise and time to perform an EFQM assessment for the recognition scheme’s pinnacle, the EFQM Global Award – one of the most challenging and robust business assessments in the world. These candidates bring a wide range of experience and knowledge to the assessment process.
23836e11-4b24-413e-9b48-75293e686da8.name: EFQM Global Award 2021 Assessor

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the EFQM Assessor Training
Successfully take part in the EFQM Global Award 2021 as an Assessor

4e461e31-e620-4cfd-b77f-4490e5b82721.description: Earners of the EFQM Validator are selected from the pool of EFQM trained validator. They contribute their expertise to provide an independent and expert view on how the organisation can improve. They deliver a detailed feedback and recommendations for embedding Continues Improvement in the culture of the organisation by using the EFQM Model. The candidate brings a wide range of experience and knowledge to the assessment process.
4e461e31-e620-4cfd-b77f-4490e5b82721.name: EFQM Validator Certified

65cc41f2-7f3f-4083-b247-1f5c6f128a5e.description: Earners of the EFQM Performance Improvement Practitioner understand the overall RADAR logic, how RADAR can be implemented into an organisation to improve performance at every level and how to use RADAR to drive the management agenda. They able to build a continuous improvement culture and mindset across the whole organisation in a very simple methodology, and deploy RADAR across day to day initiatives and key projects as an agile project performance framework.
65cc41f2-7f3f-4083-b247-1f5c6f128a5e.name: EFQM Performance Improvement Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the EFQM RADAR Workshop

e858c343-e8c0-4807-ba01-38304b912c38.description: Earners of this badge belong to the EFQM Assessor community of many EFQM trained professionals from a wide variety of organisations around the globe. They contribute their expertise and time to perform a complete management audit of an organisation using the EFQM Model. They provide a comprehensive feedback, including a scoring profile and recommendations based on the organisation’s bespoke objectives. These candidates bring a wide range of experience and knowledge to the assessment process.
e858c343-e8c0-4807-ba01-38304b912c38.name: Recognised by EFQM 2022 Assessor

e924f22f-4bf8-475d-9e1a-fb6595d5086a.description: Earners of this EFQM Practitioner digital badge have actively participated and contributed to the EFQM Impact Programme. This rapid programme takes the organisation from a start point to a baselined assessment. The EFQM Practitioner are involved through several workshops sessions in carrying out internal diagnostic and assessing their organisation, by identifying gaps vs. the EFQM Model, globally recognised as the world's most used management framework.
e924f22f-4bf8-475d-9e1a-fb6595d5086a.name: EFQM Practitioner

40fafd28-49ad-4657-bdab-fb380e71e77e.description: Earners of the Certified Recognition Organisation are organisations licensed by EFQM to deliver the assessments required for the external EFQM Recognition levels: Validated by EFQM, Qualified by EFQM, and Recognised by EFQM. These organisations demonstrate alignment to the EFQM Recognition scheme and values.
40fafd28-49ad-4657-bdab-fb380e71e77e.name: EFQM Certified Recognition Organisation

2986304a-c23f-4521-8421-b560d73ca830.description: Earners of this badge are organisations worldwide, private, public or not-for-profit, that want a rigorous external perspective on how well they are doing, with both strategic and operational feedback on how to improve, delivered by independent, trusted experts. These organisations receive a comprehensive feedback and documentation, which includes a scoring profile and detailed recommendations for improvement based on their bespoke objectives.

635b93ca-1380-4c86-9f51-4755c7ab9b89.description: Earners of this badge are organisations worldwide, private, public or not-for-profit, looking for a detailed analysis on how they are performing against the 7 criteria of the EFQM Model. Based on the submission, they receive, from external EFQM assessors, a detailed feedback on how to address their strategic objectives, as well as recommendations for progress against the Model. These candidates demonstrate their commitment to continuous improvements.
